meaningMnemonic: There aren't many <radical>tree</radical>s in your under<radical>ground</radical> <radical>prison</radical>, so you've been given a task: using only your <radical>mouth</radical> and a <radical>stool</radical>, plant as many in the <radical>ground</radical> as you can. It's an <kanji>extreme</kanji> challenge!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>extreme</kanji> challenge could only be solved by one person: <reading>Goku</reading> (ごく) from Dragon Ball Z! He has a special cloak that'll allow you to plant trees in record time, so he quickly <reading>cloaks you</reading> (きょく) to help with your extreme task.
